entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 23 December 2022
